location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map showing proposed reserve areas for future RAF requirements in northern Bahrain and Muharraq Island

mods.abstract: Imprint:F. Hindmarch Air Headquarters, Iraq Command, Hinaidi. 8-11-33.Distinctive Features:Blueprint sketch map compiled from mosaic photographs enclosed to letter no. D.O.S. 11080 dated 8th November 1933.Labelled ‘MAP No. 1’ and classified ‘Most Secret’. Shows present landing ground at Manama with boundaries of proposed reserve areas indicated by dotted line. Landmarks lettered for reference with key provided at lower right-hand corner.Inscriptions:On recto at the top left-hand corner, in red ink: ‘MOST SECRET’.
